properties.Land_Slide: Slope failure - The part of the Bambaragala Mountain belongs to Senarathwela GND
properties.Proposed_M: Soil conservation practices should be adopted; stones are available on the land. It is also preferable to settle the residents in a separate area

properties.Land_Slide: Erosion (high slope) - Near the Mrs. Wajira's house at Pinnaketiyawatta
properties.Proposed_M: A suitable allotment of land should be provided in another area

properties.Land_Slide: Construction of houses at high slope areas
properties.Proposed_M: Slope of the cuts should be adjusted as appropriate and applied.
